title: Chorizo and Butternut Squash Soup

ingredients.content: 550 g butternut squash, peeled, diced (2 cm)
115 g celery stalks, cut in pieces
1 tsp smoked paprika (hot) plus extra for serving

preparations.content: Place onions, butternut squash, celery and ghee in mixing bowl then chop <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>9 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add chorizo, passata, water, paprika and salt then cook <b>15 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Blend <b>1 min/speed 1<b> <b>-4.5, increasing speed gradually<b>. Pour into 4 bowls, add 1 Tbsp yoghurt on top of each bowl and serve garnished with a sprinkle of paprika.

hintsAndTricks: For a child friendly version, omit hot paparika and use a less hot chorizo variety.
It's best to use passata or chopped tomatoes from a carton or glass jar rather than a tin. This diminishes the risk of contamination that you would get from tomatoes stored in aluminium tins.
